problems.title: XOR Swap Without Temp
problems.description: Create a function to swap two numbers using XOR bitwise operation without using a temporary variable.
problems.inputFormat: Two space-separated integers a and b

problems.title: Fibonacci Using Recursion
problems.description: Write a recursive function to find the nth Fibonacci number.

problems.title: Function Overloading - Max
problems.description: Create overloaded max functions for 2 integers, 3 integers, and 2 doubles.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: type (2 for 2 ints, 3 for 3 ints, 4 for 2 doubles)
Second line: corresponding numbers

problems.title: Reverse Array Using Pointers
problems.description: Write a function to reverse an array in-place using pointers.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Print Right Triangle Pattern
problems.description: Write a recursive function to print a right-angled triangle pattern of stars.

problems.title: Set Kth Bit
problems.description: Write a function to set the kth bit of a number to 1 using bitwise operations.
problems.inputFormat: Two space-separated integers: n (number) and k (bit position, 0-indexed)
problems.outputFormat: Print the number after setting kth bit

problems.title: GCD Using Recursion
problems.description: Write a recursive function to find GCD of two numbers using Euclidean algorithm.
problems.inputFormat: Two space-separated integers a and b
problems.outputFormat: Print GCD of a and b

problems.title: Hollow Square Pattern
problems.description: Write a function to print a hollow square pattern using recursion.

problems.title: Count Digits Using Recursion
problems.description: Write a recursive function to count the number of digits in a number.

problems.title: Toggle Kth Bit
problems.description: Write a function to toggle (flip) the kth bit of a number using XOR.
problems.inputFormat: Two space-separated integers: n (number) and k (bit position, 0-indexed)
problems.outputFormat: Print the number after toggling kth bit

problems.title: Binary Search Using Recursion
problems.description: Write a recursive binary search function to find an element in a sorted array.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated sorted integers
Third line: target element to find

problems.title: Pyramid Pattern Using Recursion
problems.description: Write a recursive function to print a pyramid pattern of stars.

problems.title: Array Rotation Using Pointers
problems.description: Write a function using pointers to rotate an array left by k positions.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers
Third line: k (rotation count)

problems.title: Check Kth Bit Set
problems.description: Write a function to check if the kth bit of a number is set (1) or not.
problems.inputFormat: Two space-separated integers: n (number) and k (bit position, 0-indexed)
problems.outputFormat: Print 'Yes' if kth bit is set, else 'No'

problems.title: Hollow Diamond Pattern
problems.description: Write a recursive function to print a hollow diamond pattern.
problems.inputFormat: Single integer n (half height, must be odd)
